childhood and gangster squad what's your
rack and handsome my racket is I'm a
Bible salesman you want to take me away
from all this and make an honest woman
out of me no ma'am I was just hoping to
take you to bed directed by ruben
fleischer Gangster Squad is about the
los angeles police department's war on
the Mafia in the 1940s and 50s piss in
the air in his review aO Scott writes
the film is painted in cartoon colors
rather than noir shadows it is a hectic
jumble of fedoras and zoot suits and red
femme fatale dressings the accessories
of choice our guns deployed to drown out
knucklehead dialogue and inept
storytelling gangster squad would have
been more fun as an animated feature the
fanciful animals in the principal roles
find out instead of enduring mr. pens
quacking duck faced performance you
might have at least been able to enjoy
mickey cohen imagine as an actual duck
you're gonna be begging for a bullet
before it's over poor thing she's having
such a hot
this is her retirement this is a
beverage house directed by Dustin
Hoffman quartet takes place in a home
for retired British artistes and
concerns their preparations for an opera
recital in his review AO scott reitz
quartet is a sincere but sloppy piece of
work mr. Hoffman dotes on his cast of
first-rate British actors of a certain
age and invites us to savor their energy
and professionalism he wants us to sing
the quartet don't make me go last battle
such an order this is not difficult
though the efforts of these fine
performers might have yielded greater
delight if they had been given more to
do which is all right a film about opera
need not be operatic you can hum along
and no one will mind if you doze off now
and then is it really that young God how
time flies one finally professing you
know
that even directed by Benjamin Avila
clandestine childhood takes place in
1979 Argentina and is told through the
perspective of a young boy whose parents
are fighting the right-wing military
dictatorship in her review Manohla
Dargis writes the film centers mostly on
the boys confused at times confusing
role as a witness to his parents passion
and good bad and foolish choices lending
the story an extra shiver is that the
writer and director has said that the
movie isn't just drawn from true events
but also his life but when a filmmaker
proves as reluctant as mr. Avila to
really speak up about the past to engage
with its full complexity it can be hard
to hear what he's saying so I use the
candle dune esperance again vision
